description: A warm and spicy spice mix that's great on plant-based entrees and roasted veggies, this Jamaican jerk seasoning is delicious to keep on hand.
keywords: homemade jamaican jerk, jerk seasoning, jerk spice blend
name: Jamaican Jerk Seasoning Blend
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp allspice berries (or 2 tbsp ground allspice)
1/2 tsp ground nutmeg (or 1/3 tsp freshly-grated nutmeg)

recipeInstructions.text: In a dry skillet, toast cumin seeds until fragrant, then transfer to a mortar & pestle or a spice grinder. Repeat separately with the whole cloves if using, and with the whole allspice if using. Grind the toasted spices into a fine powder.
Mix in the remaining ingredients (including ground cloves and allspice if using). Store in an airtight container in a cool place. Will keep in the pantry or fridge for up to 3 months or so.
